wikipedia_page.main: General Sir Lewis Stratford Tollemache Halliday,  (14 May 1870 – 9 March 1966) was an English Royal Marine officer and a recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: * Lewis Stratford Tollemache Halliday (1870–1966), Victoria Cross recipient
